src:
DPD RI Bentuk Pansus Papua
04 Nov 2019, 23:54 by Syahril Ahmad


DPD RI Bentuk Pansus Papua

KBRN, Jakarta : Dewan Perwakilan Daerah (DPD) RI menyikapi permasalahan yang terjadi di Papua, melalui sidang paripurna luar biasa, dengan agendanya  pembentukan Panitia Khusus (Pansus) Papua, Senin  (4/11/2019).
Pansus tersebut terdiri 15 orang, yang terdiri dari utusan dari 4  komite termasuk 8 Senator dari Papua dan Papua Barat. Dua Senator Aceh, Abdullah Puteh dan Fakhrurrazi juga masuk dalam pansus tersebut.Terpilih sebagai Ketua Pansus adalah Dr. Filep Wamfama, SH., MHum (Senator Papua), Wakil Ketua,  Dr. Ir. H. Abdullah Puteh, MSi (Aceh) , Lily Amelia Salurapa, SE.,MM (Sulsel) dan Otopianus P. Tebai (Papua), masing-masing sebagai Wakil Ketua 1,2 dan 3."Alhamdulillah, saya dipercaya menjadi wakil," ujar Abdullah Puteh mantan Gubernur Aceh seraya menyebutkan, pansus  nantinya akan bekerja membantu pemerintah  mencari solusi penyelesaian akar masalah di Papua.Dalam sidang paripurna yang dipimpin Ketua La Nyalla Matalitti, DPD menilai bahwa masalah Papua yang berada di wilayah timur Indonesia, menjadi persoalan yang harus segera diselesaikan.
text:
DPD RI Establishes Papua Special Committee
Nov 04 2019, 23:54 by Syahril Ahmad


DPD RI Establishes Papua Special Committee

KBRN, Jakarta: The Indonesian Regional Representative Council (DPD) is addressing the problems that occur in Papua, through an extraordinary plenary session, with the agenda of the formation of the Papua Special Committee (Pansus), Monday (4/11/2019).
The committee consists of 15 people, consisting of delegates from 4 committees including 8 Senators from Papua and West Papua. Two Aceh Senators, Abdullah Puteh and Fakhrurrazi were also included in the special committee. Chosen as Chair of the Special Committee was Dr. Filep Wamfama, SH., MHum (Senator of Papua), Deputy Chairperson, Dr. Ir. H. Abdullah Puteh, MSi (Aceh), Lily Amelia Salurapa, SE., MM (South Sulawesi) and Otopianus P. Tebai (Papua), respectively as Deputy Chairpersons 1,2 and 3. "Alhamdulillah, I am trusted to be a representative, "said Abdullah Puteh, the former Governor of Aceh, saying that the Special Committee would later work to help the government find solutions to resolve the root causes of problems in Papua. resolved immediately.
